summary: Comprehensive testing of Sharda Lead Management Dashboard new features completed. Tested global search, notification bell with follow-up alerts, interactive DataGrid, and lead detail panel. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all notification endpoints working correctly. Frontend features are mostly working with minor issues in filter inputs and timeline loading.

ui_bugs.issue: Filter inputs not appearing after clicking Filters button

integration_issues.issue: Activity Timeline not loading due to incorrect API endpoint
integration_issues.fix_applied: Fixed endpoint from /lead-activity/ to /lead-activities/ in LeadTimeline.js

passed_tests: Backend API health check - 100% success rate (38/38 tests passed)
Login functionality working with admin/admin123 credentials
GET /api/notifications/summary endpoint working - returns 754 total notifications (748 critical, 6 info)
GET /api/notifications endpoint working - returns follow-up alerts correctly
Global search in header working perfectly - search dropdown appears with results
Notification bell showing correct 99+ badge for high notification count
Notification dropdown opens and displays follow-up alerts (748 Missed, 6 Upcoming)
Navigation to Leads page working correctly
DataGrid table displaying leads with proper columns (Enquiry No, Name, State, Dealer, Segment, Follow-up, Qualified, Stage, Actions)
Column sorting functionality working - clickable headers with sort indicators
Lead detail panel opens when clicking View button (eye icon)
Follow-up overdue warnings visible in DataGrid with red warning triangles
Lead detail panel shows follow-up overdue alerts (e.g., 'FOLLOW-UP OVERDUE - Follow-up was scheduled for 2025-07-06')
Lead information displayed correctly in detail panel (Name, Phone, Email, State, Dealer, etc.)
All backend notification endpoints functional and returning correct data
Search functionality in header works with real-time results

success_percentage.backend: 100% (38/38 API tests passed including new notification endpoints)
success_percentage.frontend: 85% (most features working, minor issues with filter inputs and timeline loading)

action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: DataGrid filter inputs not appearing after clicking Filters button. The button clicks successfully but the input fields don't render. This is a UI rendering issue in the DataGrid component.
